recipes.title: Spaghetti Carbonara
recipes.summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti. In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with cheese. Cook pancetta until crispy. Combine everything and season with black pepper.

recipes.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
recipes.summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
recipes.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Grill chicken until cooked. Prepare a sauce with onions, tomato puree, and cream. Combine chicken with the sauce.
